# braintrustdata_prompts (Data Source)

Lists Braintrust prompts using API-native filters.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List prompts in a project.
data "braintrustdata_prompts" "all" {
  # replace with real ID or wire from data/resource
  project_id = "proj-abc123"
}

# Filter prompts by name and slug.
data "braintrustdata_prompts" "filtered" {
  # replace with real ID or wire from data/resource
  project_id = "proj-abc123"
  name       = "support-agent"
  slug       = "support-agent"
}

output "prompt_lists" {
  value = {
    all_ids      = data.braintrustdata_prompts.all.ids
    filtered_ids = data.braintrustdata_prompts.filtered.ids
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `project_id` (String) The project ID to scope prompt listing.

### Optional

- `ending_before` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch prompts before this ID.
- `limit` (Number) Optional max number of prompts to return.
- `name` (String) Optional exact prompt name filter.
- `slug` (String) Optional exact prompt slug filter.
- `starting_after` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch prompts after this ID.
- `version` (String) Optional prompt version filter.

### Read-Only

- `ids` (List of String) List of returned prompt IDs.
- `prompts` (Attributes List) List of prompts. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--prompts))

<a id="nestedatt--prompts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `prompts`

Read-Only:

- `created` (String) The timestamp when the prompt was created.
- `description` (String) A description of the prompt.
- `function_type` (String) The function type associated with the prompt.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the prompt.
- `metadata` (Map of String) Metadata associated with the prompt as key-value pairs.
- `name` (String) The name of the prompt.
- `org_id` (String) The ID of the organization the prompt belongs to.
- `project_id` (String) The project ID that owns the prompt.
- `slug` (String) The prompt slug.
- `tags` (Set of String) Tags associated with the prompt.
- `user_id` (String) The ID of the user who created the prompt.
